name: recommender_projects_locations_insightTypes_insights_markAccepted
description: Marks the Insight State as Accepted. Users can use this method to indicate to the Recommender API that they have applied some action based on the insight. This stops the insight content from being updated. MarkInsightAccepted can be applied to insights in ACTIVE state. Requires the recommender.*.update IAM permission for the specified insight.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

etag.description: Required. Fingerprint of the Insight. Provides optimistic locking.

stateMetadata.description: Optional. State properties user wish to include with this state. Full replace of the current state_metadata.

$block: An insight along with the information used to derive the insight. The insight may have associated recommendations as well.

$ul: **category**: Category being targeted by the insight.
**content**: A struct of custom fields to explain the insight. Example: "grantedPermissionsCount": "1000"
**description**: Free-form human readable summary in English. The maximum length is 500 characters.
**etag**: Fingerprint of the Insight. Provides optimistic locking when updating states.
**insightSubtype**: Insight subtype. Insight content schema will be stable for a given subtype.
**lastRefreshTime**: Timestamp of the latest data used to generate the insight.
**observationPeriod**: Observation period that led to the insight. The source data used to generate the insight ends at last_refresh_time and begins at (last_refresh_time - observation_period).
**stateMetadata**: A map of metadata for the state, provided by user or automations systems.
**targetResources**: Fully qualified resource names that this insight is targeting.
